column1:
.fileUpload {
    	position: relative;
    	overflow: hidden;
    	margin: 10px;
    }
    .fileUpload input.upload {
    	position: absolute;
    	top: 0;
    	right: 0;
    	margin: 0;
    	padding: 0;
    	font-size: 20px;
    	cursor: pointer;
    	opacity: 0;
    	filter: alpha(opacity=0);
    }
